en.title: Siberian Cat Weight and Size Guide: Growth Milestones by Age
en.content:
The Siberian is one of the large cat breeds, and its impressive build is a major part of its appeal. However, many people wonder just how big they get and how quickly they grow.

Adult Siberian Size

Adult Siberian weight differs between males and females.

GenderAverage WeightBody Length (nose to tail base)
Male6-10 kgApprox. 40-50 cm
Female4-7 kgApprox. 35-45 cm

Siberians are said to take 3-5 years to fully mature, growing more slowly than other breeds. At one year old, many are still in the middle of their growth.

Weight Guidelines by Age

AgeMale (approx.)Female (approx.)
1 month400-600 g300-500 g
2 months800 g - 1.2 kg600 g - 1.0 kg
3 months1.5-2.0 kg1.2-1.8 kg
4 months2.0-3.0 kg1.8-2.5 kg
6 months3.0-4.5 kg2.5-3.5 kg
9 months4.0-6.0 kg3.0-4.5 kg
12 months5.0-7.5 kg3.5-5.5 kg
Adult (3-5 years)6-10 kg4-7 kg

These are guidelines only. Individual variation is significant, so it is important to look at overall body balance rather than weight alone.

How to Determine Ideal Weight

A cat's ideal weight is assessed using the Body Condition Score (BCS). The ideal condition is when you can feel the ribs through a thin layer of fat, and a slight waist is visible when viewed from above. Since Siberians have a thick coat, it can be difficult to judge by appearance alone. Regularly measuring weight and keeping a growth chart provides peace of mind.

Weight Management Tips

Growing kittens need adequate nutrition, but once they reach adulthood, proper portion control is important. Since indoor cats have limited exercise opportunities, it is also important to consciously create playtime. At Fuluck Cattery, we regularly record our kittens' weights to support healthy growth.

zh.title: 西伯利亚猫体重与体型指南：各月龄成长参考
zh.content:
西伯利亚猫是大型猫种之一，其威风凛凛的体格是一大魅力。不过，很多人好奇它们究竟能长多大、成长速度如何。

西伯利亚猫成猫体型

西伯利亚猫成猫的体重因性别而异。

性别平均体重体长（鼻尖至尾根）
公猫6-10公斤约40-50厘米
母猫4-7公斤约35-45厘米

西伯利亚猫据说需要3-5年才能完全成熟，比其他猫种成长更为缓慢。1岁时大多数仍处于成长阶段。

各月龄体重参考

月龄公猫（参考）母猫（参考）
1个月400-600克300-500克
2个月800克-1.2公斤600克-1.0公斤
3个月1.5-2.0公斤1.2-1.8公斤
4个月2.0-3.0公斤1.8-2.5公斤
6个月3.0-4.5公斤2.5-3.5公斤
9个月4.0-6.0公斤3.0-4.5公斤
12个月5.0-7.5公斤3.5-5.5公斤
成猫（3-5岁）6-10公斤4-7公斤

以上仅为参考。个体差异较大，因此不仅要看体重，还要关注整体体型的均衡。

如何判断理想体重

猫咪的理想体重通过体况评分（BCS）来判断。理想状态是隔着薄薄的脂肪层能摸到肋骨，从上方看能看到轻微的腰部曲线。由于西伯利亚猫被毛丰厚，仅凭外观不易判断。定期测量体重并记录成长曲线会更加安心。

体重管理要点

成长期的幼猫需要充足的营养，但成年后合理控制食量非常重要。室内猫的运动量有限，因此要有意识地安排玩耍时间。在福楽猫舍，我们日常记录每只幼猫的体重，支持它们健康成长。
